definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Qomolangma started with Gyigyi as the first bearer and Wang Yongfeng the second.
sentences.chinese: 此后，王勇峰队长担任第二棒火炬手。

sentences.english: The first flame torcher Liu Xiang ran over Tian'an men Square during domestic torch relay for Beijing Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 北京奥运会境内第一棒火炬手刘翔跑过天安门广场。

sentences.english: What's the feeling to be a torchbearer ?
sentences.chinese: 作为火炬手，你如何表达自己的心情？

sentences.english: A total of 140 runners will take part.
sentences.chinese: 总记会有140名火炬手参加。

sentences.english: Other torchbearers have pledged to donate the proceeds from the sale to charity.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些火炬手保证将出售所得用于慈善事业。

sentences.english: The relay will last 130 days, involving over 20,000 torchbearers.
sentences.chinese: 圣火传递将持续130天，包括2万名火炬手。

sentences.english: I believe the whole thing of foreign torchbearers is just for show.
sentences.chinese: 我认为搞个老外火炬手实在是为了噱头。

sentences.english: Then, i began to long for to be a torchbearer.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我又憧憬着能够成为一名火炬手。

sentences.english: The three female torchbearers all donated money that day, the statement said.
sentences.chinese: 三名火炬手当时都捐了钱。

sentences.english: Who are the main Olympic torch ?
There are 65 torch bearers in the relay, including 10 women.
sentences.chinese: 本次传递共有65名火炬手，包括10名妇女。

sentences.english: In my dream my Olympic dream came true. I was a torchbearer.
sentences.chinese: 我的奥林匹克梦实现了，我是火炬手。

sentences.english: I feel so good as the torchbearer.
sentences.chinese: 我感到作为一名火炬手很高兴。

sentences.english: How many torchbearers will take part in it?
sentences.chinese: 多少火炬手将参与这次传递？

sentences.english: Sang feels proud to be one of the Olympic torchbearers.
sentences.chinese: 当选为奥运火炬手是桑兰的骄傲。

definition: person who represents an organization and enhances its image/ambassador
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4

definition: Paralympics/same as Paralympic Games 殘奧會|残奥会[Can2 Ao4 hui4]
abbr. for 城市運動會|城市运动会[Cheng2 shi4 Yun4 dong4 hui4]
